node.id: a unique id for this node
node.parent: maybe null or the id of the parent such as is the case for controller nodes
node.name: a name for this node

properties.id: a unique id to be used for this property. Use Status Names as much as possible
properties.name: as it's going to be viewed by clients
properties.mode: read, write, read/write. For those that are read/write, a command will be created
